item.title: Upload and Download File by SFTP
item.description: When data is sent to another party, it’s potentially exposed to outside entities on the Internet, FTP and SFTP are two common file transfer options, Learning more about them will make a proper choice for sharing your company’s data. FTP v.s SFTP FTP is file transfer protocol. It’s a simple way of transferring data, making data readable for anyone who intercepts it. While this is fine if you’re just sending unimportant files.
